name: Hall of Fame 2x4
details:
Reverb with 4 MASH Switches, Shimmer and 8 PresetsTonePrint-enabled reverb pedal with updated reverb algorithms
4 MASH footswitches for toggling 4 individual reverb presets
MASH footswitches are pressure sensitive and can be used like an expression pedal to manipulate reverb parameters
Shimmer reverb algorithm based on the acclaimed Sub 'N' Up Octaver effect
Inputs for expression pedal and MIDI for external control over parameters and preset changes
6 TonePrint slots allow you to preload your pedal with custom reverb presets
Use the TonePrint editor app for Mac/PC/iPad/Android to tweak and customize your own reverb presets
Analog-dry-through design leaves your core guitar tone unprocessed
https://www.tcelectronic.com/product.html?modelCode=P0DHT
